description:
Situated in the heart of São Paulo, Transamerica Executive Nova Paulista is 2 km from Paulista Avenue and 3 km from both Ibirapuera Park and Ibirapuera Gymnasium. It offers a fitness centre and an outdoor pool. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property.

All rooms at Transamerica Executive Nova Paulista are equipped with air conditioning and free internet access. They feature a stocked minibar, work desk, safety deposit box and a private bathroom with toiletries.

Other facilities at Transamerica Executive Nova Paulista include a 24-hour front desk and business facilities for up to 100 people. Private parking is possible on site,at a surcharge.

The hotel is ideally located between Ana Rosa and Vila Mariana Metro Stations, 200 metres from Veloso Bar, famously known for it's Brazilian pastries. Within walking distance, guests will find an array of bars and restaurants in Joaquim Távora Street.

Renowned universities such as Unifesp and ESPM can be found in the surroundings of Transamerica Executive Nova Paulista. Congonhas Airport and São Paulo Expo are both 8 km away, while Guarulhos International Airport is at a distance of 25 km.

Buffet and American breakfast options are available every morning at Ibis Budget Sao Paulo Paraiso.
